function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Survivability of SARS-CoV-2 on different surfaces","Impact":"Increased risk of transmission in the built environment","Mitigation":"Regular disinfection of surfaces","Technologies":"Antimicrobial coatings, UV-C disinfection","People":"Building occupants and visitors","Owner":"Facility management and cleaning staff"},{"Description":"Short survival of SARS-CoV-1 and SARS-CoV-2 on copper surfaces","Impact":"Reduced risk of transmission on copper surfaces","Mitigation":"Increased use of copper and copper alloys in high-touch surfaces","Technologies":"Copper-based materials, copper-infused coatings","People":"Building occupants and visitors","Owner":"Facility management and construction companies"},{"Description":"Variable persistence of SARS-CoV-2 on porous surfaces","Impact":"Varied risk of transmission based on surface material","Mitigation":"Proper handling and disposal of infected porous materials","Technologies":"Disposable or washable protective barriers, antimicrobial treatments for porous materials","People":"Building occupants and visitors","Owner":"Facility management and cleaning staff"}]}
